1.name: 1. Outsiders
1.description: In a small Oklahoma town in 1964, the rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, heats up when one gang member accidentally kills a member of the other.

2.name: 2. Trading Places
2.description: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

3.name: 3. Scarface
3.description: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

4.name: 4. Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
4.description: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebel Alliance attempts to destroy the second Death Star while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

5.name: 5. National Lampoon's Vacation
5.description: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

6.name: 6. The A-Team
6.description: Four Vietnam vets, framed for a crime they didn't commit, help the innocent while on the run from the military.

7.name: 7. Risky Business
7.description: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

8.name: 8. Jaws 3
8.description: A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.

9.name: 9. Wargames
9.description: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

10.name: 10. Splash
10.description: A young man is reunited with a mermaid he briefly encountered as a boy and falls in love with her without knowing her secret.

11.name: 11. Sleepaway Camp
11.description: Bunks and showers are a mad stabber's beat at a summer camp strictly for teens.

12.name: 12. Christine
12.description: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

13.name: 13. Twilight Zone: The Movie
13.description: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

14.name: 14. Valley Girl
14.description: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

15.name: 15. Cujo
15.description: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

16.name: 16. Flashdance
16.description: An 18-year-old female amateur dancer who performs nightly at a dancing bar, and works as a welder during the day, dreams of joining the Pittsburgh ballet school.

17.name: 17. The Man Who Loved Women
17.description: A womanizing sculptor named David goes to seek help from a psychiatrist, Marianna, to cure him of his obsession with women.

18.name: 18. Videodrome
18.description: A programmer at a Toronto TV station that specializes in adult entertainment searches for the producers of a dangerous and bizarre broadcast.

19.name: 19. The Big Chill
19.description: A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

20.name: 20. Class
20.description: A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, and only later does he learn more about the woman who enlivened his night.

21.name: 21. V
21.description: A seemingly peaceful alien race, arrives at earth and asks for help to ensure their own planets survival. However, the visitors agenda turns out be much darker.

22.name: 22. Superman III
22.description: Entrepreneur Ross Webster teams up with a computer genius in order to realise his own evil intentions. When Superman obstructs his plans, he decides to destroy him.

23.name: 23. The Dead Zone
23.description: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability to foresee future events.

24.name: 24. Mama's Family
24.description: Mama's Family originated with Thelma "Mama" Harper, and her younger sister Fran living together in Mama's house.

25.name: 25. Dungeons and Dragons
25.description: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet, Krull.
